keyEvents.title: Little Oars Jr. Charges Through the Bay
keyEvents.description: Little Oars Jr. throws a Marine battleship and clears a path through Marineford Bay for the Whitebeard Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Opens a critical pathway for the Whitebeard Pirates' advance.

keyEvents.title: Kuma's Ursus Shock Devastates the Bay
keyEvents.description: Bartholomew Kuma's Ursus Shock attack destroys the thick ice sheet and causes massive structural damage to Marineford Bay.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the scale of destruction occurring during the war.

keyEvents.title: Little Oars Jr. Falls in Marineford Bay
keyEvents.description: Gecko Moria impales Little Oars Jr. with Tsuno-Tokage, bringing down the giant in the bay as he reaches for the execution platform.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the tragic end of Little Oars Jr.'s heroic charge.

description: The frozen bay area of Marineford where the main battle between the Whitebeard Pirates and the Marines takes place. The bay was frozen by Admiral Aokiji to trap the pirate ships.
